column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////With 2500+ reviews and a 4.5 star average it's clear Jinya doesn't need my stamp of approval to convince you it's THE place to go for ramen in Houston. Yes
column2: it's a chain - but so what? It still manages to best other local joints in terms of consistency
column4: and service. Here are my thoughts on what I've tried over the years:
